    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Modulus()
      use default (cryptographically strong) values for prime bits and confidence
      Modulus(int numPrimeBits, int primeConfidence)
      establish a generator and modulus for Diffie-Hellman or El Gamal encryption that satisfies the "standard" property where you don't leak information if the information is a square or something or not.
      Modulus(int numPrimeBits, int primeConfidence, java.lang.String generator, java.lang.String modulus)
